EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Business Assurance for SAP with Wipro and Tricentis - US/EMEA - 2015.0
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at our Business Assurance for SAP with Wipro and Tricentis webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Business Assurance for SAP with Wipro and Tricentis
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Sorry we missed you at our webinar, Business Assurance for SAP with Wipro and Tricentis! In the webinar, Aparna Sharma of Wipro and Michael Eckhoff of Tricentis teamed up to share an insider’s perspective on effectively implementing new software into your business environment. Questions from the audience helped keep the webinar lively and informative.
If you would like to see what you missed, a recording of our webinar is available here <http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-od-business-assurance-for-sap-emea-watch.html>.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Michael Eckhoff Senior VP of Worldwide Sales Tricentis
Aparna Sharma Testing Practice Head, Americas Wipro
